name: Captcha me if you can!
description:
With new technology comes new captchas!

When Robot-Corp hires their newest robot employees to type in captchas.

It's expected for them to work like this for the rest of their lives, however, one of them has a plan!

A plan to run away from technology and to somewhere where he can live in peace...

The moon!

__________________________________________________________________________
